snippet: Congress approved an accord with Iran to create a fact-finding commission of foreign legal experts to investigate the bombing of a Buenos Aires Jewish center in 1994.
lead_paragraph: Congress approved an accord with Iran to create a fact-finding commission of foreign legal experts to investigate the bombing of a Buenos Aires Jewish center in 1994.

headline.main: Argentina: Congress Supports Deal With Iran to Investigate 1994 Blast
headline.print_headline: Argentina: Congress Supports Deal With Iran to Investigate 1994 Blast
